page.title: 09CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: Apart from the various sporting clubs social and cultural organisations are well represented. There are several units of the Guide and Scout Movement and the Boys and Girls Brigades and Red Cross Society. There has been a support Group for the Cheshire Home for disabled children and a club for the disabled, and there is a Yateley Common Rights' group and a Residents and Ratepayers Association. There is a very active Round Table, a Royal British Legion Branch, as well as a Community Care Group,Age Concrn and a Gingerbread Club.There are Young Wives and Ladies Circle, W.R.V.S. and W.I.In addition there is a Ramblers Associat- ion and clubs for gardening,flower arranging, photography,smocking and a wine circle.Yateley has its own orch- estra,choral society and dance clubs. There is also the Yateley Society.
